verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: made] [ARG1: good] [ARG2: on a promise to give veterans more health care options] , [ARGM-ADV: signing the VA Mission Act into law Wednesday] .
President Donald Trump made good on a promise to [V: give] [ARG2: veterans] [ARG1: more health care options] , signing the VA Mission Act into law Wednesday .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] made good on a promise to give veterans more health care options , [V: signing] [ARG1: the VA Mission Act] [ARG2: into law] [ARGM-TMP: Wednesday] .
